name: Valle de la Luna
description: A stunning landscape of eroded clay formations resembling a lunar surface.

name: Teleférico Mi Teleférico
description: An aerial cable car system offering breathtaking views of the city and mountains.

name: Museo de la Coca
description: A cultural museum exploring the history and significance of the coca leaf in Andean society.

name: Plaza Murillo
description: The historic heart of La Paz, surrounded by government buildings and colonial architecture.

name: Iglesia de San Francisco
address: Av. Mariscal Santa Cruz, La Paz, Bolivia
description: A majestic 18th-century church known for its baroque architecture and rich history.

name: Mercado de las Brujas
address: Calle Melchor Jiménez, La Paz, Bolivia
description: A mystical market offering traditional remedies, amulets, and spiritual items.

name: Mirador Killi Killi
description: A scenic viewpoint offering panoramic vistas of La Paz and its dramatic skyline.

name: Parque Urbano Central
address: Av. del Ejército, La Paz, Bolivia
description: A spacious urban park ideal for walking, relaxing, and enjoying nature in the city.
